verses.text: \w The|strong="H7665"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0369"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0369"\w* stiff \w neck|strong="H6203"\w* despiseth him \w that|strong="H0369"\w* reproveth him, \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6621"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H0369"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w health|strong="H4832"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* follow him.

\w When|strong="H7235"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w increase|strong="H7235"\w*, \w the|strong="H8055"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*: \w when|strong="H7235"\w* \w the|strong="H8055"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* bear \w rule|strong="H4910"\w*, \w the|strong="H8055"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* mourn.

\w A|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0001"\w* loveth \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, rejoiceth \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0001"\w* maintaineth bar lots, \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* squander away \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w substance|strong="H1952"\w*.

\w A|strong="H0776"\w* \w just|strong="H4941"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* setteth \w up|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w a|strong="H0776"\w* covetous \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* destroy \w it|strong="H2040"\w*.

\w A|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* that speaketh \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* flattering \w and|strong="H7453"\w* dissembling words, spreadeth \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w net|strong="H7568"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w feet|strong="H6471"\w*.

\w A|strong="H0376"\w* \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* entangle \w the|strong="H8055"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w when|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* sinneth: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H8055"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* praise \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3045"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* taketh \w notice|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w cause|strong="H1779"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*: \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w is|strong="H6662"\w* void \w of|strong="H3045"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.

Corrupt \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H7725"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* ruin: \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0369"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* contend \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w a|strong="H0369"\w* \w fool|strong="H0191"\w*, whether \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* angry \w or|strong="H0369"\w* \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w*, \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* find \w no|strong="H0369"\w* rest.

Bloodthirsty \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*: \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w just|strong="H3477"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3318"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* uttereth \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mind|strong="H7307"\w*: \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w* deferreth, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* keepeth \w it|strong="H3605"\w* till afterwards.

\w A|strong="H5921"\w* prince \w that|strong="H3605"\w* gladly heareth \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, hath \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H8334"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* creditor \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w met|strong="H6298"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w another|strong="H0376"\w*: \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* enlightener \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w them|strong="H0376"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8199"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H3559"\w* judgeth \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, \w his|strong="H3559"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*: but \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H2451"\w* \w left|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0954"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* own \w will|strong="H5414"\w* bringeth \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w to|strong="H0954"\w* \w shame|strong="H0954"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*: \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* downfall.

Instruct thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* refresh thee, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w delight|strong="H4574"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

When prophecy \w shall|strong="H8451"\w* fail, \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H8451"\w* \w be|strong="H0369"\w* scattered abroad: \w but|strong="H0369"\w* \w he|strong="H8451"\w* \w that|strong="H0369"\w* keepeth \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w blessed|strong="H0835"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3588"\w* \w slave|strong="H5650"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* corrected \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* understandeth \w what|strong="H1697"\w* thou sayest, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H4617"\w*.

Hast thou \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w hasty|strong="H0213"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w speak|strong="H1697"\w*? folly \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w rather|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w looked|strong="H2372"\w* \w for|strong="H0376"\w*, \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* amendment.

He \w that|strong="H1961"\w* nourisheth \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* delicately \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w childhood|strong="H5290"\w*, afterwards \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* find \w him|strong="H1961"\w* stubborn.

\w A|strong="H0376"\w* passionate \w man|strong="H0376"\w* provoketh quarrels: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* easily stirred \w up|strong="H1624"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w more|strong="H7227"\w* prone \w to|strong="H0376"\w* sin.

Humiliation followeth \w the|strong="H8213"\w* \w proud|strong="H1346"\w*: \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w shall|strong="H0120"\w* \w uphold|strong="H8551"\w* \w the|strong="H8213"\w* \w humble|strong="H8217"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* partaker \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w thief|strong="H1590"\w*, hateth \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* heareth \w one|strong="H3808"\w* putting \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w oath|strong="H0423"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* discovereth \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* feareth \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* quickly \w fall|strong="H0982"\w*: \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* trusteth \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H7682"\w*.

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* prince: \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* cometh forth \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1870"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w abhor|strong="H8441"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* loathe \w them|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H1870"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*. \w The|strong="H1870"\w* son \w that|strong="H1870"\w* keepeth \w the|strong="H1870"\w* word, \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* free \w from|strong="H0376"\w* destruction.
